summary: An actress returns to Tokyo after a successful stint in Hollywood to reclaim - with the help of her gangster brother - the daughter she abandoned years before.
cast: Yoshiko Okada|Shin'yô Nara|Yukiko Tsukuba|Toshiko Kojima|Fumiko Katsuragi|Jôji Oka|Ichirô Yûki|Shozaburo Abe|Ken'ichi Miyajima|Kanji Kawahara|Kanji Kawara|Kenji Ôyama|Kikuko Hanaoka|Tomio Aoki|Ryuko Fuji
title: Nasanunaka
